plugin.name: Note Helpers
plugin.description: Commands to help manage NotePlan notes
plugin.author: Jonathan Clark
plugin.changelog:
v0.3.0
- added **statistics**: for now this only writes to the console log (open from the Help menu)

v0.2.0
- added **newNote**

plugin.commands.name: Create New Note
plugin.commands.description: Create new note in the current folder, with a provided title, using any currently selected text to populate the contents
